description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe has its Daredevil again. The aforementioned character, who returned to the MCU for cameos in Spider-Man: No Way Home and She-Hulk, finally has their own series once more. Titled Daredevil: Born Again, Marvel Studios went to some major lengths to make sure the Charlie Cox led series didn’t lose its edge [...]

The post Charlie Cox Comments On That Major Death In ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Charlie Cox Comments On That Major Death In ‘Daredevil: Born Again’

description:
It’s a well-known factor in the horror genre that sequels to horror movies are often rushed out as soon as possible. Sometimes, however, fans have also waited years – if not decades – for some beloved horror movies to receive the sequel treatment. Now it looks like one such sequel to a 2009 cult classic [...]

The post Sequel To 2009 Cult Classic Horror Movie In The Works appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Sequel To 2009 Cult Classic Horror Movie In The Works

description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe once again has Daredevil fighting crime in New York City. However, with Charlie Cox’s grand return as the character in Daredevil: Born Again, a few other familiar faces made their way through. One such example in Daredevil: Born Again includes a subtle cameo from a recurring MCU star. At this point, [...]

The post ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ Features MCU Cameo Many Fans Missed appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ Features MCU Cameo Many Fans Missed
